array.string: 1. I recommend having both positivity and goal visualizations. Positivity visualizations focuses on things which are good in your life. Goal visualizations focuses on goals and aspirations.

2. The appreciation and exploration of nature is proven to have a dramatic positive impact on our happiness. Get out in nature and capture a beautiful shot for a visualization. Then add a positive inspirational caption.
3. Visualizations which focus on friendship and family are great. Try to have at least one of those in your portfolio.
4. A symbolic image which represents values and character traits you want to adopt are great foundations for visualizations.
5. You may create a Visualization of a pile of cash, but consider what the feeling you want to obtain is, and try to find an image which represents that.
6. Visualizations can be great tools for adopting new habits. A picture of yourself doing a critical activity of your desired habit is a great visualization.
7. A picture of yourself smiling with the caption “smile” is a simple yet powerful visualization. Figure out what thoughts trigger your best smile, focus on those and snap that selfie.
8. Want to eat healthier? Try a picture of a healthy meal with the caption: ”This is a tasty meal”.
